synopsis.text: Amanojaku: Love Hate Weirdo follows the journey of Hiiragi Yatsuse, a first-year high school student who finds it difficult to form friendships despite his constant efforts to be liked by others. One summer day, his mundane life takes a supernatural turn when he encounters Tsumugi, an oni (demon) girl who is on a mission to find her mother in the human world. As snow inexplicably starts to fall, the two embark on an exciting adventure together, despite their contrasting personalities and Hiiragi's inability to say no to others. Will Hiiragi finally find the friendship he's been searching for, or will Tsumugi's quest lead them down a dangerous path? Join them on their journey to find out.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
